channel.title: Posts on Slime
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Slime

item.title: Building a Matrix Homeserver in Elixir Part 1
item.description: Recently I decided to undertake another project in Elixir, and I wanted to work on something more difficult than SlimeChan, but still fairly managable. I eventually came to the idea of implementing a Matrix homeserver, as I’ve found Matrix very appealing since I learaned about it in 2019.

item.title: A Reflection on Studying a Dead Language
item.description: I spent a large part of my time in this semester of college studying Coptic, the language of Egypt before Arabization and last descendant of the heiroglyphic Egyptian that everyone knows about.

item.title: First Post
item.description: Today I got this site up and running using Hugo. I’m mainly hoping to use it as a place to write about my experiences working on my projects, and to put info about those projects.
